summary: 2000 FORD WINDSTAR LX PARK ON SLIGHT INCLINE, NO KEYS IN IGNITION OR BRAKE PEDAL DEPRESSED.  2 YEAR OLD KNEELING ON DRIVERS SEAT, PULLED DOWN ON GEAR SHIFT LEVER, TRANSMISSION RELEASED AND VEHICLE ROLLED 100 FT AND COLLIDED WITH ANOTHER PARKED VEHICLE.  I TOOK POSSESSION OF THE LEASED VEHICLE 8/30/2000,  I FOUND A REPAIR WAS MADE FOR THE EXACT CONDITION 8/28/2000 AFTER VEHICLE REPAIR HISTORY REPORT WAS RUN.   *NLM
